experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey in software development

hagalink.description: Custom software development for companies. Implementation of innovative solutions in the technology sector.

tangram.description: Creation of modern and responsive user interfaces. Implementation of design systems.

aula.description: Founding administrator of the Free Software Classroom at Córdoba's Vocational Training. Development of free software projects and promotion of open technologies.

peninsular.description: Development of corporate websites and e-commerce. Collaboration on multidisciplinary projects.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn more about my experience and passion for development
about.paragraph1: I'm a full stack developer with over 2 years of experience creating software. I'm passionate about solving complex problems with clean and efficient code. I'm also part of initiatives like being the founder of the Free Software Classroom at Córdoba's Vocational Training, where we promote the use of open technologies and collaborative learning.
about.paragraph2: I've also considered starting my own tech startup, Hagalink, where I lead a development team to create innovative custom solutions for companies.
about.paragraph3: I also enjoy learning new technologies and sharing knowledge with the developer community.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk!
contact.description: I'm available for collaborations or freelance projects, don't hesitate to contact me!
